lead_paragraph: Facing a potential Republican surge at November’s midterm elections, Democratic candidates are clamoring for Hillary Clinton to join them on the campaign trail.

headline.main: Democrats Clamoring for Hillary Clinton as Midterms Campaigner
headline.print_headline: Democrats Clamoring for Hillary Clinton as Midterms Campaigner

snippet: Facing a potential Republican surge at November’s midterm elections, Democratic candidates are clamoring for Hillary Clinton to join them on the campaign trail....
